mapper.select: LEFT JOIN wx_housesource wh on wl.houseid = wh.houseid LEFT JOIN wx_comm wc on wh.commid = wc.id LEFT JOIN wx_agentinfo wa on wh.agent_openid = wa.agent_openid where wl.openid = #{openid} and wl.deal = '0' and wl.delByClient = '0' order by wl.time desc limit #{_st},#{_ed}

LEFT JOIN wx_housesource wh on wl.houseid = wh.houseid LEFT JOIN wx_comm wc on wh.commid = wc.id where wl.houseid in (select houseid from wx_housesource where agent_openid = #{openid}) and wl.deal = '0' and wl.delByAgent = '0' order by wl.time desc limit #{_st},#{_ed}
